metadata.title: CVE-2023-28161 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description: If temporary "one-time" permissions, such as the ability to use the Camera,were granted to a document loaded using a file: URL, that permissionpersisted in that tab for all other documents loaded from a file: URL. Thisis potentially dangerous if the local files came from different sources,such as in a download directory. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 111.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
